name: validate_score_v1
description: Validates a score.v1 JSON against schema rules and additional hard constraints (timing bounds, monophony per track, pitch/velocity ranges). Returns violations with precise locations.

score_json.description: The score object following score.v1 contract.

constraints_json.description: Optional constraints.v1 object. If provided, enforce required_tracks, pitch_ranges, max_events_per_bar, velocity_levels, etc.

strict.description: If true, treats warnings as errors.
